meanings: (사실처럼 보이다) plausible, (사실처럼 보이지만 실은 거짓인) specious

vlive.korean: 그럴 사람이 없대요 로하가~ AROHA said there's no one like that. 듣기 View video ASTRO : 초콜릿스트로🍫

examples.korean: She complained, with reason, that she had been underpaid. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 저임금을 받아왔다고 불평했는데, 그럴 만도 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She complained, with reason, that she had been underpaid. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Uh, yeah, I guess so. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 음, 네, 그럴 거예요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Uh, yeah, I guess so. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: A new car would be wonderful but the fact of the matter is that we can’t afford one. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 새 차라면 멋지겠지. 하지만 사실은 우리가 그럴 형편이 안 돼. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: A new car would be wonderful but the fact of the matter is that we can’t afford one. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: ‘He didn’t see me, I guess.’ 듣기 Add to Wordbook “그는 나를 못 봤어. 그럴 거야.” Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: ‘He didn’t see me, I guess.’ Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: ‘Is he coming?’ ‘I hope so.’ 듣기 Add to Wordbook “그가 오나요?” “그럴 거예요.” Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
